EmailTemplate.name: 20-50 Response
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in the YETI Custom Logo Program!
YETI Coolers with a custom logo are the ultimate, unique, one of a kind way to say thank you, promote, reward, or raise funds for a worthwhile organization. Please take a few minutes to review the attached details and requirements for the YETI Custom Logo Program and certainly let us know if you are ready to get started with a custom logo project.
Thanks,
{!User.CommunityNickname} Business Development Team YETI 512.402.5895 corporatesales@yeti.com yeti.com
